sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2010/L.2/Rev.1), the SBI: invites the LEG, in collaboration with the GEF and its agencies, to continue to assist LDCs to complete their NAPAs as soon as possible; requests the Secretariat to prepare a report on the regional training workshops on the implementation of NAPAs; requests the LEG to provide information on the need to revise and update NAPAs, as well on the required resources; and invites parties in a position to do so to continue to provide resources.
